body:
If you have ever played the old Mordekaiser, and then played the new one its very easy to see how much riot fucked up.

There is nothing about this "mordekaiser" champ that is similar to the real mordekaiser (the old one)
his old ult was a nice and creative ult: mordekaiser  would summon a "copy" of the champion killed which he would then control(he could also take dragon which was very cool). The new ult takes a champion into death ream In a 1v1 showdown -- hold on isn't this a team game?

The gameplay of the old mordekaiser was fun: his w would do lots of dmg and just when the enemy thought you would die pop the w and a big heal would occur. now all you can do on this poorly-made new Mordekaiser is e, q and w if your low. That is the most BORING gameplay ever. PLUS his cooldowns are HUGE
I also want to take a quick look at another champion we have in league his name is Yorick HOLD ON Yorick and Mordekaiser aren't the same person. YEA that's what I thought too, they could get be twins all their abilities and main skin have same effects but at least Yorick is somewhat fun to play.

in conclusion, Riot own up to your mistake and revert Mordekaiser . you already got the money form his rework, you can now revert him and sell all of his skins again this is NICE money for you, and due to this crappy rework It seems that money is all you want
ps. FIRE who ever reworked Mordekaiser so they cant ruin the game anyone :)

-A mord main before the shitty rework.

In all seriousness, there are legit tons of old morde mains on these boards, I believe most of them were very pleased with how the rework turned out. I'm not a main but I did like him before and he's pretty ok rn

Old passive → new W1
Old Q → new passive
Old W AoE → new passive
Old W heal → new W2
Old E → new Q

The only part of old Morde's kit that's truly gone is the ult... and good riddance to that; it was incredibly buggy.

>If you have ever played the old Mordekaiser, and then played the new one its very easy to see how much riot fucked up.

 I see a less buggy, more fleshed out, more viable champion with an objectively better aesthetic/design. 

>There is nothing about this "mordekaiser" champ that is similar to the real mordekaiser (the old one)

 That's usually the point of a rework. New Mordekaiser is supposed to be different from the old version on every level except for the _general_ theme (Big armored dude hits people with a hammer and has/is made of dark magic) 

>his old ult was a nice and creative ult: mordekaiser would summon a "copy" of the champion killed which he would then control(he could also take dragon which was very cool). 

 Not saying that the new ultimate is balanced but at the very least it's unique. Both of them were to be honest. 

>in conclusion, Riot own up to your mistake and revert Mordekaiser . you already got the money form his rework, you can now revert him and sell all of his skins again this is NICE money for you, and due to this crappy rework It seems that money is all you want
ps. FIRE who ever reworked Mordekaiser so they cant ruin the game anyone :)

 That would piss so many people off it's not even funny. 

 Also, objectively speaking, Mordekaiser's rework is a complete success. His playrate and winrate have skyrocketed and his design now better fits in the grand scheme of League.

Edit: And this is also coming from someone with M5 on Morde (pre-rework.) So while I'm not a super diehard fan or anything, after my 40-50+ games I definitely prefer the new Morde.
